title: New: Mount Eerie – Distorted Cymbal
body:
For an artist as prolific and ambitious with his output as **Mount Eerie**, it’s perhaps a surprise that’s it been over two years since his last release, _**[Wind’s Poem](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wind%27s_Poem)**._ Well thankfully Phil Elverum is back with this improvised-like little gem.

The track, “**_Distorted Cymbals_**,” will come out through **K Records** as a 7″ on February 7th.

Hear it at [K Records’ Tumblr](http://krecs.tumblr.com/post/12563034248).
